parameters: Now's not the time to eat!

Maybe I'll try the right side. It seems a little less busy.

Hang on, this hoodie is really bothering me.
Wait... I know that face! That's Black Licorice!

...Are you sure you're even resonating with it? Remember what the

Swallow your pride and hand over the crystal!
Hehe... It's like they're playing with a ball of yarn...
This must've been that... teleportation thing that Ingrid mentioned.
Looked just like the time their captain fled the battle, too.
I hope that means that they're okay...
How did she say that these things worked?
Ah, whatever, I'll figure it out.
Let's see what I can teleport!
I could teleport to Pops... but I don't even know where he is...
*sigh* I wish I could just have some of Pops's cooking again... Those
meat pies really reminded of what he used to make...
So I can summon pie, huh? Hehehe...
Come on crystal... gimme some more pie!
Looks okay... but it smells kinda weird.
Maybe I just didn't do a good enough job that time...
Just gotta think really hard about pie!
In fact, today we'll be having our annual meat pie festival in celebration
of his birthday! We'll have a massive one large enough for everyone in
That wasn't what I was expecting...
How does something like this even-\.\.\^
Ingrid didn't mention anything like this when she told me about the
The left one's name is Mystery, and the right one's name is Blitzkrieg.
They're on the younger side, though. The ones from the war are
Would've loved to see 'em in action.
I could actually hear everything those girls were talking about
from here, I just wasn't paying attention.
You can believe my surprise when I saw a giant pie jump across
The horses seemed to get really worked up at the sight of that
monster yesterday, but they've mellowed out now.
I hope that's the last time something like that happens... It
makes me anxious when they get scared.
This statue was erected in memorial of General Carrington Hyde.
A hero, leader, and friend to all.
Thing about construction is that you never really have a good view
of the progress you've made until one day, BAM, it's like you've
I swear I just saw a giant pie with two legs jump around here and move
I think that's a sign. I'm grabbing something to eat.
This must have been put here to tempt you.
Wouldn't it be nice if you could just eat all these carrots?
Unfortunately, they belong to someone. So you can't do that. That
That's a lot of wheat... Wonder if it tastes even remotely bread-like...
They eat this stuff up. Maybe there's just something that we're not

This must be for harvesting the wheat.
This must be for harvesting the wheat.
This is wood for the construction site, but it also kinda feels
like you could hide behind it. It's an odd, specific feeling that
you dwell on for just a moment.
You hid behind it. The prophecy has been fulfilled.
This is what we're talking ab-\^
This barrel is being watched carefully by the one next to it.
Unfortunately, it really hasn't been in use for a while.
At this point, we might turn it into something new altogether.
I like to look at this statue of General Hyde when I feel lost.
I feel like I get inspired!
